about_the_game: This is a classic single-player adventure RPG in which you take on the role of a brave man and gather your companions to delve into the cursed realm of the devil, challenge the dark monarchs, and rescue the imprisoned descendants of the royal family. During your adventure, you can level up by defeating demons, purchase legendary equipment with the crystals you collect, and complete ancient trials issued by hermits to obtain holy relics containing mysterious power - all of which will become the key to breaking through the boundary of the abyss. In the depths of the magical realm lie epic props that will change the course of battle, and only the wisest of explorers will be able to unravel the riddles that have been sealed for thousands of years.

short_description: Players will need to unlock hidden formulas and solve logic puzzles to gain new skills while battling powerful digitized creatures in turn-based combat. During the quest, players can also collect equipment and resources to strengthen their abilities and prepare for the eventual discovery of “Y”.
